summary:
Add Major Battle Clashes between
Dremora and Dawnguard allied Vigilance
Vanilla Assets only No Script
descriptionHtml:
Add Major Battle Clashes between
Dremora and Dawnguard allied Vigilance
Vanilla Assets only No Script

[color=#ffff00][size=5]Thank you for the support and donation:
[/size][/color][color=#ffff00][size=3]I never thought the community here on nexus are very kind people, I cant thank enough these individuals
who supported me financially so I'll just post their name in my mod pages.
[color=#ffff00][size=3][size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/7889849/?]mayd4me[/url][/size][/size][/color][/size][/color]
[color=#ff7700][size=5][color=#f4f4f4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/users/3089165/?]Huniken[/url][/color][/size][/color]
[color=#00ffff][size=5][color=#00ffff][size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4053262/?][b]C.P.[/b][/url][/size][/color]
[b]Thierry[/b][/size][/color][color=#00ffff][size=5](mysterious donator)[/size][/color]

[color=#00ff00][size=3]My other Battle Mods:[b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80945?]Werewolves VS Vampires ft. Werebears by [b]dlarkz[/b][/url][/b]
[/size][/color][b][color=#00ff00][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83391?]Talos War by dlarkz[/url][/size][/color][/b]
[size=3][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83568?]Draugrs VS Falmers by dlarkz[/url][/b][/size]
[b][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83609?]Dark Brotherhood VS Morag Tong by dlarkz[/url][/size][/b]

Story:
[i]Mehrunes Dagon[/i] has been pissed off by losing worshippers to the Dawnguards and Vigilant of Stendarr.
So he sent his elite dremora soldiers to assist Molag Bal's vampires on exterminating
the Dawnguards and Vigilant of Stendarr.
On the other side the Dawnguards and the Vigilance prepare a unit to guard
The Shrine of [i]Mehrunes Dagon[/i] to ensure no one will revere it.


[b][size=3]Npcs that die will respawn within 10 days
just dont visit the place within 10 days.[/size][/b]

There are 8 version.
[color=#00ff00]Non perked Version[/color]
1. Stendarr side
2. Stendarr side Robed Steel Plate You need the [color=#00ff00][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10506/?]Robed Steel Plate Armor by [b]MadCat221[/b][/url][/size][/color]
3. [i]Mehrunes Dagon[/i] side
4. [i]Mehrunes Dagon[/i] side Robed Steel Plate You need the [color=#00ff00][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10506/?]Robed Steel Plate Armor by [b]MadCat221[/b][/url][/size][/color]

[color=#00ff00]Perked Version[/color]
5. Stendarr side PERK
6. Stendarr side PERK Robed Steel Plate You need the [color=#00ff00][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10506/?]Robed Steel Plate Armor by [b]MadCat221[/b][/url][/size][/color]
7. [i]Mehrunes Dagon[/i] side PERK
8. [i]Mehrunes Dagon[/i] sideÂ  PERK Robed Steel Plate You need the [color=#00ff00][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10506/?]Robed Steel Plate Armor by [b]MadCat221[/b][/url][/size][/color]
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Locations of the Major Battles:

The Shrine of [i]Mehrunes Dagon[/i]
20 vs 20

[b]Stendarr's Beacon[/b]
20 vs 20

[b]Dayspring Canyon[/b]
20 vs 20

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Requirements: Skyrim Latest Update, Dawnguard, Dragonborn
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Installation: Use NMM or manually install by drag and drop to Data Folder
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Update to latest version: Download and Overwrite if ask
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Uninstall: Use NMM or manually delete files and esp (Completely safe to uninstall anytime)
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Compatibility: Compatible with all Mods because I only use Vanilla Assets
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Future Plans: Add More Vanilla Enemies
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Check out my other Skyrim mods: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/27633780/?tb=mods&pUp=1]dlarkz skyrim mods[/url]
